steps.title: Lodge a Hydraulic Fracturing Activity Report
steps.name: Report Details

inputs.name: title
inputs.label: Title of the Report
inputs.placeholder: PL123, Well name, hydraulic fracturing activities completion report, zones/stages

rules.name: required
params: A Title is required for the report

rules.name: max
params: The Title of the report cannot be more than 256 characters

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Report Description
inputs.placeholder: Describe the contents of the report and its associated documents, including a summary of activities, significant results, conclusions, main methods used, areas of interest etc

inputs.name: reportAuthor
inputs.label: Report Author
inputs.subLabelAtTop: Please enter the name of the person who has authored this report

rules.name: required
params: Report Author is required

rules.name: max
params: The Report Author cannot be more than 256 characters

rules.name: required
params: Activity Start Date is required

rules.name: typeError
params: Activity Start Date is required

rules.name: required
params: Activity End Date is required

rules.name: typeError
params: Activity End Date is required

rules.name: min
params: yup.ref('startDate')
The Activity End Date must be greater than the Activity Start Date

inputs.name: title
inputs.label: Title of the Report
inputs.placeholder: e.g. EPM123, Project Name, annual report for period ending 28-04-2020

rules.name: required
params: A Title is required for the report

rules.name: max
params: The Title of the report cannot be more than 256 characters

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Report Description
inputs.placeholder: Describe a summary of the report for a coal or oil shale mining lease including activities, significant results, conclusions, metals/minerals/deposit type, main methods used, target areas of interest etc.

inputs.name: reportAuthor
inputs.label: Report Author
inputs.subLabelAtTop: Please enter the name of the person who has authored this report

rules.name: required
params: Report Author is required

rules.name: max
params: The Report Author cannot be more than 256 characters

rules.name: required
params: Report Period Start Date is required

rules.name: typeError
params: Report Period Start Date is required

rules.name: required
params: Report Period End Date is required

rules.name: min
params: yup.ref('startDate')
The Report Period End Date must be greater than the Report Period Start Date

rules.name: typeError
params: Report Period End Date is required

steps.title: Lodge a Coal or Mineral Permit Report - Final (Grant of higher tenure)
steps.name: Report Details

inputs.name: title
inputs.label: Title of the Report
inputs.placeholder: e.g. EPM123, Project Name, final report for period ending 28-04-2020

rules.name: required
params: A Title is required for the report

rules.name: max
params: The Title of the report cannot be more than 256 characters

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Report Description
inputs.placeholder: Describe a summary of the final report where higher tenure has been granted for the overlying area including activities, significant results, conclusions, metals/minerals/deposit type, main methods used, target areas of interest etc.

inputs.name: reportAuthor
inputs.label: Report Author
inputs.subLabelAtTop: Please enter the name of the person who has authored this report

rules.name: required
params: Report Author is required

rules.name: max
params: The Report Author cannot be more than 256 characters

rules.name: required
params: Report Period Start Date is required

rules.name: typeError
params: Report Period Start Date is required

rules.name: required
params: Report Period End Date is required

rules.name: min
params: yup.ref('startDate')
The Report Period End Date must be greater than the Report Period Start Date

rules.name: typeError
params: Report Period End Date is required

inputs.subLabelAtTop: Please enter the name of the person who has authored this report

rules.name: required
params: Report Author is required

rules.name: max
params: The Report Author cannot be more than 256 characters

rules.name: required
params: Report Period Start Date is required

rules.name: typeError
params: Report Period Start Date is required

rules.name: required
params: Report Period End Date is required

rules.name: min
params: yup.ref('startDate')
The Report Period End Date must be greater than the Report Period Start Date

params: Report Period End Date is required
